Articles.Content:
I was wondering how to make custom textures for my Kerbs'. I've seen some of KurtJMacs videos with his kerbals wearing 3D glasses.

-Thanks!
The thing you're talking about is a wonderful mod called http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-kas-kerbal-attachment-system-v0-1/. The Sunglasses are from a different mod that uses KAS.
